## ChannelOptions."grpc-node.tls\_enable\_trace" property

Set to `1` to [write TLS packet trace information to stderr](https://nodejs.org/api/tls.html#tlssocketenabletrace)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
"grpc-node.tls_enable_trace"?: number | undefined;
```
